en.title: Quantum Pendant Wearers, China Beijing 2008 Olympic Team Athletes!
en.content:
Women 42km Marathon, Left to Right : Zhou Chun Xiu, Wei Ya Nan & Zhang Shu Jing.
Men 50km Walk, Left to Right : Zhao Cheng Liang, Yu Chao Hong & Li Jian Bo.
